thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 19 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Skechers USA Inc Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.75

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Skechers USA Inc Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.75
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Skechers USA Inc:
* SKECHERS ACHIEVES NEW QUARTERLY SALES RECORD IN FIRST QUARTER 2018
* Q1 SALES $1.25 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.2 BILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.74 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR Q2 OF 2018, COMPANY BELIEVES IT WILL ACHIEVE SALES IN RANGE OF $1.120 BILLION TO $1.145 BILLION
* FOR Q2 2018 EXPECTS DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $0.38 TO $0.43.
* CONTINUES TO ANTICIPATE THAT ITS 2018 ANNUAL TAX RATE WILL BE IN RANGE OF 12 PERCENT TO 17 PERCENT
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.54, REVENUE VIEW $1.16 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
